categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Khandrex was a male Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3636 BBY he was on Ziost when former Sith Emperor Vitiate came to the world and possessed many of the Imperials on the planet, turning them into his puppets to murder civilians. Khandrex was among those who fell under his control and he was killed during the fighting.
Lord Khandrex was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan in game update 3.2.
